sqlMap.select:
SELECT IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M01, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '02' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M02, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '03' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M03, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M04, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '05' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M05, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M06, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '07' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M07, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '08' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M08, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '09' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M09, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '10' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M10, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M11, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M12 FROM BGAB_GASCRM01$corp_cd$ RM01 LEFT OUTER JOIN BGAB_GASCZ002$corp_cd$ Z002 ON RM01.REQ_EENO = Z002.XUSR_EMPNO WHERE 1 = 1
RM01.PTT_YMD LIKE CONCAT(#key_year#, '%')
Z002.XUSR_DEPT_CODE = #key_dept_cd#

SELECT IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M01, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '02' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M02, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '03' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M03, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M04, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '05' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M05, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M06, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '07' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M07, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '08' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M08, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '09' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M09, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '10' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M10, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M11, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M12 FROM BGAB_GASCPO01$corp_cd$ PO01 LEFT OUTER JOIN BGAB_GASCZ002$corp_cd$ Z002 ON PO01.REQ_EENO = Z002.XUSR_EMPNO WHERE 1 = 1
PO01.PTT_YMD LIKE CONCAT(#key_year#, '%')
Z002.XUSR_DEPT_CODE = #key_dept_cd#

SELECT IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M01, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '02' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M02, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '03' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M03, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M04, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '05' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M05, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M06, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '07' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M07, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '08' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M08, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '09' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M09, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '10' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M10, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M11, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(PTT_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M12 FROM BGAB_GASCTM01$corp_cd$ TM01 LEFT OUTER JOIN BGAB_GASCZ002$corp_cd$ Z002 ON TM01.EENO = Z002.XUSR_EMPNO WHERE 1 = 1
TM01.PTT_YMD LIKE CONCAT(#key_year#, '%')
Z002.XUSR_DEPT_CODE = #key_dept_cd#

SELECT IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M01, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '02' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M02, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '03' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M03, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M04, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '05' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M05, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '06' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M06, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '07' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M07, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '08' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M08, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '09' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M09, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '10' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M10, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M11, IFNULL(sum( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(REG_YMD,'%Y%m%d'), '%m') = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS M12 FROM BGAB_GASCVL01$corp_cd$ TM01 LEFT OUTER JOIN BGAB_GASCZ002$corp_cd$ Z002 ON TM01.EENO = Z002.XUSR_EMPNO WHERE 1 = 1
TM01.REG_YMD LIKE CONCAT(#key_year#, '%')
Z002.XUSR_DEPT_CODE = #key_dept_cd#
